name: Polyrun
description:
Polyrun is an action packed, indie runner game filled with features. Competitive local multiplayer, In depth character customization, endless singleplayer, power ups and more. Test your agility and reflexes, and climb the leaderboard ranks.

Character Customization:
Earn in-game currency, Polycoin, by playing and earning high scores. No microtransactions necessary! With your earned Polycoin, you can purchase cosmetic items from the customization store! Give your Polyrunner a makeover, anything from hats, glasses and shirts, to gloves, shoes, tails and more!

Endless Singleplayer:
This mode is your traditional, endless runner experience! Weaving your customized Polyrunner between the obstacles, grabbing score cubes and obtaining power ups! Keep practising at your agility and reflexes, and see your username climb the leaderboards!

Local Multiplayer:
Get competitive in the local multiplayer versus mode! Grab a friend and be the best at chasing down those precious score cubes! Use power ups to aid yourself, or to impair your opponent! One round simply not enough? Try the best out of three Tournament mode!



Polyrun was proudly created in Christchurch, New Zealand by the team at Aurora Gameworks.
